title: Tesla Stock Jumps to Start 2022
sub_head: Shares of the auto maker were up 12% in recent trading after it reported more vehicle deliveries world-wide last year than analysts estimated.
body:
Tesla Inc. shares jumped Monday after the electric-vehicle maker said deliveries surged in 2021.
The stock was up 12% in recent trading, to a share price of about $1,184. It was less than 4% below its record close of $1,229.91, set in early November. The S&P 500 was recently up about 0.4%.
